summary: Mewen, re: user finding studio with soul
mainText: 'That for sure, I've no doubt there will be always be existing and new studios crafting games that way, and they will stand out from the rest'

summary: Mewen, re: Level-5's CEO claim that 80%-90% of game code is written by AI
mainText: 'Damn... I imagine that the majority of the studio didn't choose to work that way, and they have to endure it, it must suck the life out of you... Can't imagine the mess they have to deal with'

summary: Thomas, re: Hatsuya appreciating Hytale's artstyle
mainText: 'I really appreciate @HatsuyaDev. I love your creations too. Keep doing nice things! Also, it's not only into my hands, we are a small team of very talented artists who are pouring their skills into the visuals. I'm not alone!'

summary: Thomas, re: Hatsuya's alt face texturing
mainText: 'I think the left one looks very cute, and that our current character creator will allow very similar options, we just haven't shown everything yet. Also character customization is a huge topic and looooots of things we want to improve in the future. We just need time üòå'

'Thanks! Artists from the team will make more too :)
For the next one we were thinking about showing how to rig for attachments and anim. This just requires a bit of planing, it's additional work on top of the work we do for release!'

summary: Buddha, re: GrumpyOnVal getting a Hytale Creator Code
Simon, re: Jannis joking that Simon had to have had insider information when he said Hytale would be using Blockbench going forward
Thomas, re: Hugo liking the Magma Golem Concept Video
mainText: 'Happy it helps! Tried to keep as short as possible - and I was recording that while being sick haha..Challenging'
'This topic is so far in the future that we haven't considered any of the consequences. The rendering in Hytale is getting more stabilized before we expand it's feature-set.'

summary: Slikey, re: user disappointed in restriction to Cubes and Plans
mainText: 'We do not support this for various reason: performance and artistic coherence. You may run into limitations but Hytale is not a general game engine and rather a moddable game. Hytale has opinions and this is one of them.'
